item.title: Extruder Masterclass
item.author: invalid@example.com (tarquin)
item.dc:creator: tarquin
item.content:encoded:
Alrighty.
Stuck with the extruder?
Daren't click on it in case it blows up your machine?
Can't work out how to do stuff with it?
Ask here, no matter how trivial & you shall be answered (though I reserve the right to an occasional dash of sarcasm).

You people had better post questions, or I'll be forced to assume that you're all having fun extruding stuff & I'll release a NEW, extra-complicated version of the extruder. Yes, one where you have to type in the QUATERNIONS yourself!...

Extruder Masterclass

item.title: OK to compile for Postal 2?

item.content:encoded: Is it OK if I recompile your Brushbuilders for Postal 2?

item.title: Suggestions: Terrain Flattening & Height Texturing
item.author: invalid@example.com (purehybrid)
item.dc:creator: purehybrid
item.content:encoded:
Never really used much terrain in UEd 'till recently, and I've been finding that a few things ive wanted to do, have been missing. Simple tools, or additions to tools that I think would really speed up development of realistic terrain. Unfortunatly, I never write things down, lol, so I can only remember two things atm.

1) Terrain Flattening
Terrain Flattening, needs options to:
Flatten if Higher than (FiH),
Flatten if Lower than (FiL),
and Flatten Both higher or lower than the...

Suggestions: Terrain Flattening & Height Texturing

item.title: Tarquin tools for unreal 2.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dandeloreon1984)
item.dc:creator: Dandeloreon1984
item.content:encoded:
after trying to get the tools to work with the original unreal 2 editor, and have it fail, i decicded to fix the problem with all tools...

so far i figured out that the the following line needs to be changed...

function bool Build()


I canged it to....

event bool build()

The only error left in compiling is as follows...

Analyzing...
1 Classes (IncActive=0)
Parsing TarquinExtrudeBuilder
C:\games\Unreal2\TarquinExtrudeBuilder\Classes\TarquinExtrudeBuilder.uc(93) :...

Tarquin tools for unreal 2.

item.content:encoded: I think TarquinÂ´s brushes should come with all Ueds by default, they are so usefull. The spiralsteps works alot better than the default one, no strange "sheets" linking all steps.

item.title: Biggup to Tarquin!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Pseudopath)
item.dc:creator: Pseudopath
item.content:encoded:
I just wanted to start a thread where people could thank Tarquin for all the work he put in to the UEd builders he's published. :tup:

I also wanted to ask Tarquin if he is started coding again?

Lets show Taquin he's appreciated! Post your messages here!

item.title: New gamesite need help
item.author: invalid@example.com (Arundo)
item.dc:creator: Arundo
item.content:encoded:
Hi there,

We are working on a new gamesite.
But we need people who bring news and comments to the news and forum so if you are interested in games plz visit our site.

You can also register your name so you can post comments on the news and the forums.

We also need newsposters so if you feel you can be one plz let us know.

http://www.urban-syndicate.net

Greetz USN|Arundo

item.title: Grrrrr..
item.author: invalid@example.com (HW-Stalker)
item.dc:creator: HW-Stalker
item.content:encoded:
Installed your extrude pack and my UED is borked... so I have a question. I think I may have inadvertantly loaded the TarquinExtrudeBuilder.u file under the actor browser by a mis click and now UED crashes when I try to boot it up and this is the error I get......



A window opens and says it is searching for actors then this error pops up and I dunno what to do to remove the package from the actor browser from outside of...

Grrrrr..

item.title: I have a question.. :P
item.author: invalid@example.com (Stormy)
item.dc:creator: Stormy
item.content:encoded: Is it possible to overide UlnrealEd 2.0's default toolbars? I want use the Toolbar creator to customize it the way I want by reorganizing the icons. Any ideas? And by the way, awesome tools, Tarq! You know what would be REALLY cool? A cave brush. I know the extruder will do it....but that's alot of point/path settings. Didn't an earlier version ask for specs for a cave or something?

item.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cookie)
item.dc:creator: Cookie
item.content:encoded:
Howdy,

Badlands is a new total conversion mod for UT set in the wild, wild, West! And we're looking for some more hands around camp. This isn't just a "cool idea", we're a serious team approaching our first beta release, scheduled for early this summer!

In fact, you can read a great interview about the mod at MPZ. And then you can check out our site here. We've got...

Wanted: Dead or Alive!
